Bash(then psql $DATABASE_URL -c "
-- care_initial_visit_1„ÅÆÊù°‰ª∂„ÇíÁ¢∫Ë™ç
SELECT 
  bonus_code,
  bonus_name,
  predefined_conditions
FROM bonus_master

")

Bash(then psql $DATABASE_URL -c "
-- care_initial_visit_1„Å®care_initial_visit_2„ÅÆË©≥Á¥∞„ÇíÁ¢∫Ë™ç
SELECT 
  bonus_code,
  bonus_name,
  fixed_points,
  can_combine_with,
  cannot_combine_with,
  is_active,
  display_order
FROM bonus_master
WHERE bonus_code IN (''care_initial_visit_1'', ''care_initial_visit_2'')
ORDER BY bonus_code;
")

Bash(then psql $DATABASE_URL -c "
-- „ÉÜ„Çπ„Éà2„ÅÆË®™ÂïèË®òÈå≤„ÅßÂÆüÈöõ„Å´„Å©„ÅÆÂä†ÁÆó„ÅåË©ï‰æ°„Åï„Çå„Åü„ÅãÁ¢∫Ë™ç
SELECT 
  bch.id,
  bm.bonus_code,
  bm.bonus_name,
  bch.calculated_points,
  bch.calculation_details
FROM bonus_calculation_history bch
JOIN bonus_master bm ON bch.bonus_master_id = bm.id
WHERE bch.nursing_record_id = ''6f9cc678-7220-4656-9502-93886e20c9a2''
ORDER BY bch.created_at;
")

Bash(then psql $DATABASE_URL -c "
-- care_initial_visit_1„ÅÆÊù°‰ª∂„ÇíÂÜçÁ¢∫Ë™ç
SELECT 
  bonus_code,
  bonus_name,
  predefined_conditions,

Bash(then psql $DATABASE_URL -c "
-- „ÉÜ„Çπ„Éà3„ÅÆË®™ÂïèË®òÈå≤„ÇíÁ¢∫Ë™ç
SELECT 
  id,
  visit_date,
  actual_start_time,
  actual_end_time,
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (actual_end_time - actual_start_time))/60 as duration_minutes,
  is_first_visit_of_plan,
  calculated_points,
  applied_bonuses::jsonb->0->>''bonusName'' as bonus1,
  applied_bonuses::jsonb->1->>''bonusName'' as bonus2
FROM nursing_records
WHERE id = ''7cecddf0-d18f-4d79-bcb1-fba5df12fb26'';
")

Bash(then psql $DATABASE_URL -c "
-- care_initial_visit_2„Å®care_long_visit„ÇíÁõ∏‰∫í„Å´‰ΩµÁÆóÂÆöÂèØËÉΩ„Å´„Åô„Çã
UPDATE bonus_master
SET can_combine_with = array_append(can_combine_with, ''care_long_visit'')
WHERE bonus_code = ''care_initial_visit_2'';

UPDATE bonus_master
SET can_combine_with = array_append(can_combine_with, ''care_initial_visit_2'')
WHERE bonus_code = ''care_long_visit'';

-- Á¢∫Ë™ç
SELECT 
  bonus_code,
  bonus_name,
  can_combine_with,
  cannot_combine_with
FROM bonus_master
WHERE bonus_code IN (''care_initial_visit_2'', ''care_long_visit'')
ORDER BY bonus_code;
")

Bash(then psql $DATABASE_URL -c "
SELECT 
  bonus_code,
  bonus_name,
  insurance_type,
  predefined_conditions,
  is_active
FROM bonus_master
WHERE is_active = true
  AND predefined_conditions IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY insurance_type, display_order
LIMIT 10;
")

Bash(then psql $DATABASE_URL -c "SELECT bonus_code, bonus_name, insurance_type, predefined_conditions, is_active FROM bonus_master WHERE is_active = true AND predefined_conditions IS NOT NULL ORDER BY insurance_type, display_order LIMIT 10;")

Bash(then psql $DATABASE_URL -c "SELECT bonus_code, bonus_name, insurance_type, predefined_conditions FROM bonus_master WHERE bonus_code IN (''medical_discharge_joint_guidance'', ''care_initial_visit_1'', ''care_initial_visit_2'', ''care_long_visit'', ''care_emergency_system'', ''care_emergency_system_2'') AND is_active = true ORDER BY bonus_code;")
